title: Procedural Map Generation for Roguelike Games
description: Game prototype made with Godot Engine. Using algorithms, the game generates a new map (and rooms) every time the player start a new game. The map consists of runs connected by a door. The player can move between runs and fight enemies. The size and shape of every room is random.

title: PokemonInfo
description: Web application that shows information about all Pokemons. The user can search for a Pokemon by name. The app shows the Pokémon's name and image, on click it shows the Pokémon's number, type, and stats.
